input.sentences: the view of the villa was amazing !
there was also this fountain that greeted us .
who would n't be enjoying this view ?
one day | we will own a property like this .
output.sentences: The Villa has an amazing view of the gardens.
The plants are kept alive by a bubbling fountain.
The fountain has greeted many stray cats, looking for a goldfish snack.
The neighbors across the road spend their evenings enjoying the view.
It's a great piece of property to spend a warm spring day.
